auth.verify_body:
Hello {{name}},

Thank you for creating your GymPro account. To get started, please verify your email address by clicking the button below:

Verify Email Address

If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:

{{verifyUrl}}

If you didn't create this account, you can safely ignore this email.

Best regards,
The GymPro Team
auth.reset_password_body:
Hello {{name}},

We received a request to reset the password for your GymPro account. If you made this request, click the button below to create a new password:

Reset Password

If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:

{{resetUrl}}

This link will expire in 1 hour for security purposes.

If you didn't request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.

Best regards,
The GymPro Team
auth.resent: Verification email has been resent successfully. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
auth.already_verified: Your email address has already been verified. You're all set!

onboarding.completed_subject: Welcome to GymPro - Let's Get Started!

Hello {{name}},

Your Free Trial

You're starting with a {{trialDays}}-day free trial of GymPro. This gives you full access to explore all our features and see how GymPro can transform your gym management.

What's Next?

  • Explore your dashboard and familiarize yourself with the tools
  • Add your gym members and staff

Manage Your Subscription

subscription.created_body:
Hello {{name}},

Great news! Your subscription to {{planName}} has been successfully activated.

You now have access to all the features included in your plan. We're excited to help you manage your gym operations more efficiently.

What's Next?

  • Explore your dashboard to get started
  • Set up your gym profile and preferences
  • Invite your team members to collaborate

If you have any questions or need assistance, our support team is here to help.

Best regards,
The GymPro Team
subscription.cancelled_body:
Hello {{name}},

We've processed your cancellation request. Your subscription will remain active until {{date}}, and you'll continue to have full access to all features until then.

What Happens Next?

  • Your subscription will not renew automatically
  • You can continue using all features until {{date}}
  • Your data will be safely stored for 30 days after cancellation
  • You can reactivate your subscription anytime before {{date}}

We're sorry to see you go. If there's anything we could have done better, we'd love to hear your feedback.

If you change your mind, you can easily reactivate your subscription from your account settings.

Best regards,
The GymPro Team
subscription.reactivated_body:
Hello {{name}},

Great news! Your GymPro subscription has been successfully reactivated.

Your account is now fully restored with all your previous settings and data intact. You can continue managing your gym operations without any interruption.

What's Restored:

  • All your gym and member data
  • Your custom settings and preferences
  • Full access to all plan features
  • Automatic renewal for uninterrupted service

Thank you for coming back! We're excited to continue supporting your business.

Best regards,
The GymPro Team
subscription.downgrade_scheduled_body:
Hello {{name}},

We've received your request to change your subscription plan. Your plan will be updated to {{planName}} on {{date}}.

Important Information:

  • Your current plan remains active until {{date}}
  • You'll continue to have full access to current features
  • The new plan will take effect automatically on {{date}}
  • You can cancel this change anytime before {{date}}

After the change takes effect, your billing will be adjusted to reflect the new plan pricing.

If you have any questions about this change or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Best regards,
The GymPro Team
subscription.pending_change_cancelled_body:
Hello {{name}},

Your pending plan change has been cancelled successfully. Your subscription will continue on your current plan.

Best regards,
The GymPro Team
